alert.note: Alert for La Moure; Logan; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 09 at 3:37PM CST until November 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...La Moure, Logan, and McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST tonight. For the Blizzard Warning, from Midnight tonight to Midnight CST Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
